gameStateCondition.title: Game State Condition Settings
gameStateCondition.becameNoticeDetail: Triggers once only at the moment of state change.
gameStateCondition.becameNoticeExample: (e.g. game start moment, clear moment, game over moment)
gameStateCondition.pattern1Detail: Moment playing state is reached â†’ Play BGM, show UI
gameStateCondition.pattern2Detail: Moment success state is reached â†’ Confetti effect, victory sound
gameStateCondition.pattern3Detail: While in paused state â†’ Disable controls, semi-transparent display

timeCondition.title: Time Condition Settings
timeCondition.intervalHelp: Actual interval may vary slightly due to per-frame processing
timeCondition.exactDescription: Triggers once at exact specified time
timeCondition.pattern1Detail: Trigger at 0s â†’ Show title, play BGM
timeCondition.pattern2Detail: Trigger at 60s â†’ Game over, score tally
timeCondition.pattern3Detail: Trigger every 5s â†’ Spawn enemy, generate item

down.label: Tap
down.description: Triggers at the moment of touch

hold.label: Hold
hold.description: Triggers after holding for specified duration

exact.label: Exact Time
exact.description: Triggers once at exact specified time

range.label: Time Range
range.description: Triggers continuously within specified time range

enter.label: Collision Enter
enter.description: Triggers at the moment of collision

stage.label: Stage Region
stage.description: Detect entry into specified stage region

hitbox.label: Hitbox (Fast)
hitbox.description: Fast collision detection using rectangular hitbox

pixel.label: Pixel Perfect (Precise)
pixel.description: Precise collision detection at pixel level

offToOn.label: OFFâ†’ON
offToOn.description: Triggers when flag changes from OFF to ON

onToOff.label: ONâ†’OFF
onToOff.description: Triggers when flag changes from ON to OFF

success.label: Success State
success.detail: State when player has achieved victory conditions and cleared the game

failure.label: Failure State
failure.detail: State when player has met defeat conditions and game is over

playing.label: Playing
playing.detail: Normal play state when game has started and player can operate

paused.label: Paused
paused.detail: State when game is paused and time is stopped

is.label: While in state
is.description: Triggers continuously while in specified state

not.label: While not in state
not.description: Triggers continuously while not in specified state

became.label: Moment of change
became.description: Triggers once only at moment of state change

randomAction.label: Random Action
randomAction.description: Execute random action from multiple options

straight.label: Straight
straight.description: Move in straight line to position

pricing.freePlanTitle: What you can do with Free Plan

premiumBenefits.unlimitedCreationDesc: Create unlimited games without monthly limits

faq.changePaymentMethod: Q. I want to change my payment method
faq.changePaymentMethodAnswer: A. You can start the payment process again from the plan selection page.
faq.cardInfoConcern: Q. I'm concerned about entering card information
faq.cardInfoConcernAnswer: A. Payment is processed securely through Stripe, used worldwide. Card information is encrypted and not stored by us.
faq.canCancelAnswer: A. Yes, you can cancel anytime. After cancellation, you can continue using Premium features until the next renewal date.
